adventures.title: Avon Colorado Adventure
adventures.description: Experience the best of Colorado's high country with scenic hikes, craft breweries, and local cuisine.

adventures.title: Moab Desert Adventure
adventures.description: Explore stunning red rock landscapes with iconic arches and desert trails.

adventures.title: Glacier National Park
adventures.description: Discover pristine wilderness with alpine lakes and dramatic mountain peaks.

adventures.title: Acadia National Park
adventures.description: Experience rugged coastline and granite peaks in Maine's only national park.

adventures.title: Lake Tahoe Alpine Adventure
adventures.description: Discover crystal-clear waters and mountain peaks around America's largest alpine lake.

adventures.title: Sedona Red Rock Experience
adventures.description: Explore mystical red rock formations and energy vortexes in Arizona's desert landscape.
